record.description: [University of Chicago Track Team, 1928:] fifth row: A. A. Stagg (coach); fourth row: S. Teitelman, W. Brand, C. A. Weaver, H. W. Boesel, and B. S. Wattenberg; third row: C. E. Shulz and H. E. Haydon; second row: C. S. Gleason, L. E. Alpitz, R. B. Williams, V. J. Gist (captain), and W. F. Klein; first row: V. K. Libby, J. Cody, L. E. Smith, N. Root, and S. S. Frey.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
